questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a firewall?
options: To scan for malware on a system
To encrypt files for secure storage

questions.question: Which hashing algorithm is considered weak due to collision vulnerabilities?
What does the principle of 'least privilege' mean in cybersecurity?
options: Users should only have access necessary for their job role
All users should have administrative rights
Users should not be allowed to change their passwords
Privileged accounts should be shared among employees
questions.answer: Users should only have access necessary for their job role

questions.question: Which protocol is used to securely transfer files over a network?
What is the main purpose of a VPN?
options: To provide a secure encrypted connection over an untrusted network
To block malware from infecting a system
questions.answer: To provide a secure encrypted connection over an untrusted network

questions.question: Which of the following is a social engineering attack?
What is a zero-day vulnerability?
options: A vulnerability discovered after a patch has been released
A security flaw unknown to the vendor and unpatched
A vulnerability that affects only outdated software
A type of malware that targets operating systems
questions.answer: A security flaw unknown to the vendor and unpatched

questions.question: Which security model focuses on preventing unauthorized data modification?
What type of malware encrypts a victim's data and demands payment for its release?
Which layer of the OSI model is responsible for end-to-end communication and error recovery?
